alert.note: Alert for Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 09 at 12:10PM CST until November 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel will be nearly impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
